title: what are you looking forward to in 5.3?
body: 5.3 drops on Thursday I myself can't wait for the match history update and the new {{champion:222}} skin

replies.body: Is Nemesis draft coming in 5.3? Can't find anything in regards to when that's coming.

I don't believe it is, but you can always hope.

I think Nemesis is 5.4/5
Well that sucks. It's a while away if that's the case...

Ok, it's official. Looking forward to Nemesis draft.

Oh sh!t, I may not have internet when it's released...

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XiRp84hl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-10T05:58:53.759+0000)
>
> j4 buff xd

le epoc sweg flag lelel

Jinx skin is supposed to be this patch

They just haven't actually brought it out yet.

Oh is that so? May as well be in 5.3 if they are gonna leave it till the last day tbh.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-52-notes

And yeah i think they %%%%ed up and it was gonna be 5.3 (chinese new year) Meanwhile i've been here waiting for it :(
